idea-plugin.name: Love Your Eyes Theme
idea-plugin.description: EN: This is a green theme. If you want to think about it, you can get more green on your head every day. In fact, this is a bright color theme with mung bean sand color, which is suitable for daytime use. Compared with the default all white tone, Maybe some eye protection effect, but it will make you feel soft, not white eyes 中文: 这是一款绿色主题，要想过得去，每天头上多点绿，骗你的，其实这是一款采用了绿豆沙色的亮色主题，适合白天使用，相比较默认的全白色调， 或许有些许护眼效果，但一定能让你感到柔和，而不是白花眼
idea-plugin.change-notes: • 1.0 修改几乎所有背景为绿豆沙色，有问题再更新
